relationships.description: Harry is concerned that McGonagall would be upset if she knew about the plan to complain about Umbridge.
Harry and his friends are opposed to Umbridge's teaching methods.
Ron is also opposed to Umbridge's teaching methods.
Hermione wants to do something about Umbridge because she's a bad teacher.
Harry and Ron are friends who have a conversation about Umbridge.
Hermione is also friends with Ron.
